Articles.Content:
https://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Kerbin

The page content looks broken to me, all the content is inserted inside the infobox to the right of the page, while the whole left is blank.

This doesn't happen for e.g. Duna. I've tested in 3 different browsers.

I can hear you thinking "it's a wiki, edit it!"... I've even looked at the wiki sources... but couldn't figure out what's wrong. I've looked at the content, Kerbin/Params and Templates. If there's something missing or dangling, that breaks the page, I couldn't spot it.

Anybody else that could give it a look?
Hi @81ninja, yep it seems to be a problem, we are taking a look, thanks for reporting.
